Yep, I crashed the game.  This time I did it with a soldier.  Damn it, 
I didn't even reach experience level 300. (According to the Gladiator 
file checker, he has reached experience level 253 and the amount of 
experience he has is 312,676,219.)  [Anyone have an idea what the max 
amount of experience might be before it causes the game to crash?  
Could it be 268,435,456 - the nearest power of 2 that is lower?]  I 
did find the max strength value to be 32,767 (right where I expected 
it to be).
